definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: It is legal to stay in China only after you have the valid Residence Permit.
sentences.chinese: 留學生持居留許可在華居住方屬合法。

sentences.english: While Jim was mending his bike, Lin Tao came to see him.
sentences.chinese: 合法吉姆修自行車時，林濤來看他。

sentences.english: See if cell-phone searches without a warrant should be illegal.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解下是否沒有許可證進行手機搜索是合法的。

sentences.english: The State protects the lawful rights and interests of schools and other institutions of education from infringement.
sentences.chinese: 國家保護學校及其他教育機構的合法權益不受侵犯。

sentences.english: A composite formula for calculation of horizontal electric field generated by return stroke current is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種計算地閃回擊電流水平電場的混合法。

sentences.english: Chinas real estate market sector in between legal and illegal.
sentences.chinese: 中國的房地產市場界於合法和非法之間。

sentences.english: Toge ther they would have the legitimacy and the clout to tackle almost any issue.
sentences.chinese: 這樣他們既合法又有影響力能解決幾乎所有問題。

sentences.english: Of course, another big draw of marriage is the legal benefits.
sentences.chinese: 當然，婚姻的另一誘因是婚後可擁有的合法利益。

sentences.english: The method of theory-model and example analysis were employed.
sentences.chinese: 採用理論建模與實證分析相結合法進行研究。

sentences.english: The legitimacy of women's studies as a discipline has for long been challenged by academic circles.
sentences.chinese: 婦女學的學科合法性長期受到學術界的質疑。

sentences.english: These companies will pursue every legal route to protect their customers.
sentences.chinese: 這些公司將通過每個合法的路由來保護他們的客戶。

sentences.english: It's illegal for them to drink.
Due to the lack of legitimacy, the justice of the war is prevalently challenged.
sentences.chinese: 由於師出無名，這場戰爭始終存在着合法性危機。

sentences.english: Conscience is considered legal James, an indescribable pain.
sentences.chinese: 良心認爲合法的景慕，有着無法形容的痛苦。

sentences.english: The proposal has "validated" and "legitimated" the city today, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他說，提案於今日生效併合法化。

sentences.english: Nadia's story doesn't easily lend itself to either side of the legalization debate.
sentences.chinese: 娜迪婭的經歷不能單純支持合法化辯論的任何一方。
